title: NETWORK_ALLOW_REMOTE_ATTACHMENT_MODIFICATION
content:
0x267C78C60E806B9A0xBB2D33D3// NetworkAllowRemoteAttachmentModification
void NETWORK_ALLOW_REMOTE_ATTACHMENT_MODIFICATION(Entity entity, BOOL toggle);Parameters:entity: Entity handle to allow remote attachment for.toggle: true/false.Allows scripts to use attachment commands on entities (eg. ATTACH_ENTITY_TO_ENTITY) that are not controlled by the client.Note: This is only local and does not affect entities on other machines. This is used by the ferris wheel script to sync players on carts.Old name:  _NETWORK_ALLOW_LOCAL_ENTITY_ATTACHMENT
codeBlocks:
local entity = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
-- Example usage for NETWORK_ALLOW_REMOTE_ATTACHMENT_MODIFICATION
NetworkAllowRemoteAttachmentModification(entity, true)
